data.name: Project Mind
data.detailed_description:
Expand your fleet by raiding other spaceships in this action packed space-themed shooter with both First-Person & Spaceship Combat or explore galaxies noone has been before...

DEFEND PROJECT MIND IN SPACE:


Destroy the aldions` spaceships before they harm your fleet...

RAID SPACESHIPS TO EXPAND YOUR FLEET:


Find a way into hostile motherships and scavange WEAPONS, UPGRADE PARTS or ...the whole SPACESHIP...

PREPARE FOR THE FINAL FIGHT...


Reclaim implants to unlock new ABILITIES or get protection by upgrading your SHIELD.

...OR DISCOVER NEW GALAXIES:


Need a brake from destroying Aldions?
Just launch your spaceship and discover galaxies noone has been before...

ABOUT PROJECT MIND:

The scientific project develops implants which improve your mind in certain aspects.
The aldions consider this project a unnatural, dangerous venture and try everything to cancle it.
That’s why they infiltrate the spaceship of project mind and steal all data and implants necessary to keep the project alive...

data.short_description: RAID other spaceships, EXPAND your fleet and EXPLORE space in this action packed Shooter to ensure Project Mind doesn´t fall into the wrong hands...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: AMD FirePro W5100
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
